sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
vpst1.RECID,
vpst1.CURRENCYCODE_W,
vpst1.DEFAULTDIMENSION,
vpst1.VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR,
vpst1.TRANSACTIONCODE,
vpst1.INVENTDIMID,
vpst1.ITEMID,
vpst1.PROCUREMENTCATEGORY,
vpst1.PURCHUNIT,
vpst1.ORIGPURCHID,
vpst1.ACCOUNTINGDATE,
vpst1.INVENTDATE,
vpst1.PURCHASELINEEXPECTEDDELIVERYDATE,
vpst1.DELIVERYDATE,
vpst1.INVENTTRANSID,
vpst1.DATAAREAID,
replace(vpst1.PACKINGSLIPID,'\','\\') as PACKINGSLIPID,
vpst1.LINENUM,
vpst1.PURCHASELINELINENUMBER,
vpst1.INVENTQTY,
vpst1.QTY,
vpst1.LINEAMOUNT_W,
vpst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
vpsj1.DLVMODE as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_DLVMODE,
vpsj1.DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
vpsj1.INVOICEACCOUNT as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_INVOICEACCOUNT,
vpsj1.ORDERACCOUNT as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_ORDERACCOUNT,
vpsj1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
pt1.RETURNREASONCODEID as PURCHTABLE_RETURNREASONCODEID,
pt1.WORKERPURCHPLACER as PURCHTABLE_WORKERPURCHPLACER,
pt1.REQUESTER as PURCHTABLE_REQUESTER,
pt1.DOCUMENTSTATUS as PURCHTABLE_DOCUMENTSTATUS,
pt1.PURCHSTATUS as PURCHTABLE_PURCHSTATUS,
pt1.DELIVERYDATE as PURCHTABLE_DELIVERYDATE,
pt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as PURCHTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
itm1.UNITID as INVENTTABLEMODULE_UNITID,
itm1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as INVENTTABLEMODULE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
pl1.ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH as PURCHLINE_ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH,
pl1.DELIVERYTYPE as PURCHLINE_DELIVERYTYPE,
pl1.STOCKEDPRODUCT as PURCHLINE_STOCKEDPRODUCT,
pl1.PURCHSTATUS as PURCHLINE_PURCHSTATUS,
pl1.PURCHASETYPE as PURCHLINE_PURCHASETYPE,
pl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as PURCHLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE,
tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_DELIVERY_TYPE,
tet3.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_DOCUMENT_STATUS,
tet4.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE4_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_LINE_STATUS,
tet5.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE5_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_HEADER_STATUS,
tet6.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE6_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCHASE_TYPE,
(
        SELECT
            MAX(LastUpdateDate)
        FROM
            (
                VALUES
                    (vpst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (isnull (vpsj1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (pt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (itm1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (
                        isnull (
                            pl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
                            '1950-01-01'
                        )
                    )
            ) AS UpdateDate (LastUpdateDate)
    ) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from dbo.VENDPACKINGSLIPTRANS vpst1
left join dbo.VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR vpsj1 on
	vpst1.VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR = vpsj1.RECID
left join dbo.PURCHTABLE pt1 on
	vpst1.DATAAREAID = pt1.DATAAREAID and
	vpst1.ORIGPURCHID = pt1.PURCHID
left join dbo.INVENTTABLEMODULE itm1 on
	itm1.MODULETYPE = 0 and
	vpst1.DATAAREAID = itm1.DATAAREAID and
	vpst1.ITEMID = itm1.ITEMID
left join dbo.PURCHLINE pl1 on
	vpst1.DATAAREAID = pl1.DATAAREAID and
	vpst1.INVENTTRANSID = pl1.INVENTTRANSID
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'AssetTransTypePurch'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet1 on
	pl1.ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH = tet1.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'TradeLineDlvType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet2 on
	pl1.DELIVERYTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'DocumentStatus'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet3 on
	pt1.DOCUMENTSTATUS = tet3.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'PurchStatus'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet4 on
	pl1.PURCHSTATUS = tet4.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'PurchStatus'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet5 on
	pt1.PURCHSTATUS = tet5.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'PurchaseType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet6 on
	pl1.PURCHASETYPE = tet6.ENUMVALUE
where
(
        SELECT
            MAX(LastUpdateDate)
        FROM
            (
                VALUES
                    (vpst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (isnull (vpsj1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (pt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (itm1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (
                        isnull (
                            pl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
                            '1950-01-01'
                        )
                    )
            ) AS UpdateDate (LastUpdateDate)
    ) >  '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}'

@concat('select 
vpst1.recid AS RECID,
vpst1.currencycode_w AS CURRENCYCODE_W,
vpst1.defaultdimension AS DEFAULTDIMENSION,
vpst1.vendpackingslipjour AS VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR,
vpst1.transactioncode AS TRANSACTIONCODE,
vpst1.inventdimid AS INVENTDIMID,
vpst1.itemid AS ITEMID,
vpst1.procurementcategory AS PROCUREMENTCATEGORY,
vpst1.purchunit AS PURCHUNIT,
vpst1.origpurchid AS ORIGPURCHID,
vpst1.accountingdate AS ACCOUNTINGDATE,
vpst1.inventdate AS INVENTDATE,
vpst1.purchaselineexpecteddeliverydate AS PURCHASELINEEXPECTEDDELIVERYDATE,
vpst1.deliverydate AS DELIVERYDATE,
vpst1.inventtransid AS INVENTTRANSID,
vpst1.dataareaid AS DATAAREAID,
replace(vpst1.packingslipid,''\'',''\\'') as PACKINGSLIPID,
vpst1.linenum AS LINENUM,
vpst1.purchaselinelinenumber AS PURCHASELINELINENUMBER,
vpst1.inventqty AS INVENTQTY,
vpst1.qty AS QTY,
vpst1.lineamount_w AS LINEAMOUNT_W,
vpst1.modifieddatetime AS MODIFIEDDATETIME,
vpsj1.dlvmode as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_DLVMODE,
vpsj1.deliverypostaladdress as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
vpsj1.invoiceaccount as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_INVOICEACCOUNT,
vpsj1.orderaccount as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_ORDERACCOUNT,
vpsj1.modifieddatetime as VENDPACKINGSLIPJOUR_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
pt1.returnreasoncodeid as PURCHTABLE_RETURNREASONCODEID,
pt1.workerpurchplacer as PURCHTABLE_WORKERPURCHPLACER,
pt1.requester as PURCHTABLE_REQUESTER,
pt1.documentstatus as PURCHTABLE_DOCUMENTSTATUS,
pt1.purchstatus as PURCHTABLE_PURCHSTATUS,
pt1.deliverydate as PURCHTABLE_DELIVERYDATE,
pt1.modifieddatetime as PURCHTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
itm1.unitid as INVENTTABLEMODULE_UNITID,
itm1.modifieddatetime as INVENTTABLEMODULE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
pl1.assettranstypepurch as PURCHLINE_ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH,
pl1.deliverytype as PURCHLINE_DELIVERYTYPE,
pl1.stockedproduct as PURCHLINE_STOCKEDPRODUCT,
pl1.purchstatus as PURCHLINE_PURCHSTATUS,
pl1.purchasetype as PURCHLINE_PURCHASETYPE,
pl1.modifieddatetime as PURCHLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
tet1.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE,
tet2.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_DELIVERY_TYPE,
tet3.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_DOCUMENT_STATUS,
tet4.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE4_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_LINE_STATUS,
tet5.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE5_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_HEADER_STATUS,
tet6.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE6_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCHASE_TYPE,
(
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (vpst1.modifieddatetime),
                    (isnull (vpsj1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
                    (isnull (pt1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
                    (isnull (itm1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
                    (
                        isnull (
                            pl1.modifieddatetime,
                            ''1950-01-01''
                        )
                    )
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','vendpackingsliptrans vpst1
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','vendpackingslipjour vpsj1 on
	vpst1.vendpackingslipjour = vpsj1.recid
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','purchtable pt1 on
	vpst1.dataareaid = pt1.dataareaid and
	vpst1.origpurchid = pt1.purchid
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','inventtablemodule itm1 on
	itm1.moduletype = 0 and
	vpst1.dataareaid = itm1.dataareaid and
	vpst1.itemid = itm1.itemid
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','purchline pl1 on
	vpst1.dataareaid = pl1.dataareaid and
	vpst1.inventtransid = pl1.inventtransid
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''assettranstypepurch''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet1 on
	pl1.assettranstypepurch = tet1.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''tradelinedlvtype''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet2 on
	pl1.deliverytype = tet2.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''documentstatus''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet3 on
	pt1.documentstatus = tet3.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''purchstatus''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet4 on
	pl1.purchstatus = tet4.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''purchstatus''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet5 on
	pt1.purchstatus = tet5.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''purchasetype''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet6 on
	pl1.purchasetype = tet6.enumvalue
where
(
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (vpst1.modifieddatetime),
                    (isnull (vpsj1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
                    (isnull (pt1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
                    (isnull (itm1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
                    (
                        isnull (
                            pl1.modifieddatetime,
                            ''1950-01-01''
                        )
                    )
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) > ','''',variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp'),'''')
